name: Blind Bastion
description:
Blind Bastion is a platformer featuring a lost, blind character.

The player must navigate the environment using only their feeling and memory, but you'll be stopped by pits of spikes. Luckily for you,  you'll remember exactly where you've been, and each time you die it'll become just a little easier to know where you're going next!

This game was developed in four days for the UOC Game Jam 2022, the theme being 'Stuck in a Loop'.
